name: Linux-TOE stack
short_description: This project aims at implementing  TOE Friendly network stack for the Linux Kernel, which is responsible to offload the TCP/IP process to the underlying TOE supporting network adapter or passes it on to the Generic NIC (TCP/IP layer).
